summary: MANUFACTURER HAS NOT PRESENTED REMEDY TO RECALL IN A TIMELY MANNER. HUMID DAYS ARE APPROACHING AS WELL AS AN INCREASE IN MALFUNCTIONING AIR BAG. I TOOK MY CAR TO GET ONE RECALL SERVICED AS IT HAD TWO AND THE DEALER SAID IT ONLY HAD ONE READY AND THY HAD NO TIMETABLE OF WHEN THE OTHER REMEDY WOULD BE AVAILABLE.
